pageTitle: Majestic Therma Base Hooded Performance Fleece - Closeout Sale - Soccer Equipment and Gear
textBeforeTable: Adult Manufacturer's Measurements - Therma Base™ fabric provides great insulation - Kangaroo pocket keeps hands warm and belongings safe - Four-way stretch for maximum comfort - 95% polyester/5% spandex performance fleece is durable Description: Made in the USA Line drives, doubles, triples.. and even homeruns - grab a bat and start warming up in this Therma Base™ Hooded Sweatshirt! Featuring Therma Base™ enhanced technology that provides players with insulation, comfort and breathability at practice and before every game.
